column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My go-to favorites here are the potatoes and the wrapped dates. There's always enough on the small plate for everyone
column2: and you can probably feel decently full from these two alone. The bacon wrapped dates have a very sweet date in the middle wrapped by strong
column4: all drenched in a juicy sauce. You can never have just one bite! However
column5: if you need a bit of vegetables or something more refreshing
column6: I would also recommended the brussels sprout salad.
